description: Watch SmoothSkin's trauma be his undoing.

description: Defeat the Charcarrion by letting its corpse decompose.

description: Defeat the final boss without Nowak in your active party.

displayName: It Happens to the Best of Us

description: Defeat the final boss in under 45 minutes.

name: ACH_Area_All_Perfect
description: Complete all areas with no casualties on Hardmode.

name: ACH_100Percent
description: This longest and strangest dream comes to an end.

name: ACH_Misc_NowakSurviveOsman
description: Have Nowak be the lone survivor of an encounter with the Witness.

name: ACH_Misc_HeavenRebirth
description: Sacrifice the same party member to "Come Home" twice during an encounter with the Divine.

description: Fully explore all zones in Hardmode.

description: Hire all 3 party members from the Fools Board.

name: ACH_Misc_HardKill
description: Complete a difficult encounter before any enemies can act.

name: ACH_Misc_DontAct
description: Complete a combat encounter without any party members performing an ability.
